normalized: it was after-school of the sixth day, since i had planted the bug in cara.
i had managed to manipulate information about an incident, by collaborating with my associates on the outside.
it was kitae,
who had received the following information,
the missing student has been seen on the outside.
obviously, it was false information.
however, according to it──
the student was accompanied by someone.
most probably, by a vampire.
this was the domain of kamimura the hunter.

name: azuma
normalized: please leave it to me.
i'll definitely save that student.
she grinned confidently, while biting down on the filter of her cigarette.
it was all a sham.
however, the hunter wouldn't be back for a while, as she was about to leave for a faraway place.
as a result, i would be able to afford my undivided attention to cara's training, with this nosy woman out of my way.
by the time she returned, i would have transformed cara into my puppet.
i had been looking forward to this night.
i had been informed that cara had been wandering around the school aimlessly, since after school.

name: cara
normalized: oh… are you still here, despite the time?
the queen came to the classroom, after everyone had already left.

name: yamakawa
normalized: i am working here, as i tend to laze around after returning to the dormitory.
what is up, professor cara?

name: cara
normalized: i was taking a stroll in order to kill some time, as marika is in her class.

name: yamakawa
normalized: a stroll, huh…?
i almost burst into laughter instinctively, after she gave me the same response as last time.

name: cara
normalized: is it so strange to stroll around?
the calm expression on her face, as she said that, was just as amusing.
it was completely pointless, no matter how much she sniffed around in the hopes of finding some clue.
her time had come, now that the hunter had left.

name: gram
normalized: it isn't strange at all, however, your lack of variation is quite amusing.

name: cara
normalized: uh… u-uncle…!?
as soon as i activated the bug, large beads of sweat gushed out of her beautiful skin, causing her white body to glisten with an obscene lustre.
the queen ended up hugging her agonized body by herself.

name: gram
normalized: kukukukukuku… if you want to kill some time, then how about giving up your stroll and keeping me company instead?

name: cara
normalized: kuuh…!?
you didn't have to… make time… especially for me.

name: gram
normalized: there is no need to be shy.
i will keep you company until you can't spout such words out of your mouth anymore.
i stretched my hand out towards the impertinent little girl, in order to shut her up, when,
hey there!
you vampire…

name: gram
normalized: wha!?
as soon as i turned around to face the direction from where the voice had originated, a silvery-blue streak flashed out at me.

name: gram
normalized: damn iit!
i barely managed to dodge the thing, which had been hurled at me, by throwing myself down onto the floor.

name: cara
normalized: gah!?
it ended up striking the queen, who was standing behind me.
cara collapsed down on the spot, due to its heavy impact.
and together with that, the thing, which had been hurled at me, ended up rolling over the floor with clanking sounds.
the thing, which was making those heavy metallic sounds, was the hunter's weapon── the demon slayer.

name: azuma
normalized: are you alive, miss queen?

name: gram
normalized: w-why are you here!?

name: azuma
normalized: when i faced that direction and didn't sense the student, or anything for that matter, i knew by intuition that that place was all wrong.
after all, i had always felt like the student was right here.

name: azuma
normalized: i returned to let the director know what i was thinking, and so, here i am.

name: gram
normalized: that sixth sense of yours… once again…?
damn it all to hell!
i had made a complete miscalculation.
even though she was a mere human, she had ended up destroying my plan with the use of her occult ability of intuition.
should i have gotten rid of her?

name: gram
normalized: kuuh!?
marika!
kita──

name: gram
normalized: guh── gaah!?
my heart was pierced from behind.
a spear of the black mist burst out of my chest.

name: gram
normalized: ca… raa!?

name: cara
normalized: how could you dare to do this to me!?

name: gram
normalized: goh… …!?
was it that the bug inside cara had died, when she had been struck by the tremendous spiritual power of the demon slayer?
i was pierced through my skull, just as i thought about that.

name: azuma
normalized: just get wrecked, you vampire!
a silvery-blue streak fell down on me.

name: azuma
normalized: with the power of the 9 wisdom kings!
the sanskrit characters, which had been etched onto her bat, were glowing with a pale light.

name: azuma
normalized: lay him to rest!
demon slayeer!
my body was engulfed in a pale flame the very next moment.
it was the flame of purification, which was used in exorcisms.
everything, including my flesh and even my blood, was burned to a crisp.

name: sakiyama
normalized: hah… hah… hah…
the janitor, sakiyama, was out of breath, as he rushed into the janitor's room.
and then, he leapt towards the refrigerator desperately.
it was past his usual time, as he had been taking care of the business that gram had told him to attend to.
he was already well past his limit.

name: sakiyama
normalized: come on…
sakiyama pulled out a syringe filled with a crimson-coloured fluid, before injecting it into himself.
a crimson-coloured fluid── the blood of a vampire.
sakiyama was a junkie addicted to amrita.
if he didn't inject it into himself every day, then his body would disintegrate due to his age.

name: sakiyama
normalized: haa… hah, fuuh…
his wild breathing calmed down steadily, before returning back to normal.
however, immediately after that,

name: sakiyama
normalized: ugaah!?
uguuh!?
w-what is…!?
he raised a bitter scream, before losing his consciousness.

name: sakiyama
normalized: … fuuh…
and then, he regained his consciousness, a while after having fainted.
he cracked his neck instinctively, causing a popping sound to echo out.
well, this was better than nothing.

name: sakiyama
normalized: alright.
you should be proud of yourself, sakiyama shigeo.
i was able to laugh properly this time, after having assumed the appearance of the janitor.
